materials.value: a piece of the creature whose form you choose

data.shortDescription: This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.d40ia71c2eljm91k]{Polymorph} except that it allows the creature to take on the form of a dragon or plant creature. If you use this spell to cause the target to take on the form of an animal or magical beast, it functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{Beast Shape IV}. If the form is that of an elemental, the spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{Elemental Body III}. If the form is that of a humanoid, the spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{Alter Self}. If the form is that of a plant, the spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ik4riccm7tozdwox]{Plant Shape II}. If the form is that of a dragon, the spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.iqcjiyi9leldfzxt]{Form of the Dragon I}. The subject may choose to resume its normal form as a full-round action; doing so ends the spell.
